import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext.jsx'; import './GuestDashboard.css'; // Import the CSS file const GuestDashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [myReservations, setMyReservations] = useState([]); const [activeReservations, setActiveReservations] = useState(0); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const carouselImages = [ 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=1920&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631049307264-da0ec9d70304?w=1920&q=80', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571896349842-33c89424de2d?w=1920&q=80' ]; useEffect(() => { fetchGuestStats(); }, []); // Auto carousel effect useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % carouselImages.length); }, 4000); // Change slide every 4 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [carouselImages.length]); const fetchGuestStats = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('/api/reservations'); const reservations = response.data.reservations || []; setMyReservations(reservations); setActiveReservations(reservations.filter(r => ['confirmed', 'checked-in'].includes(r.status)).length); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching reservations:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (

Loading your luxury experience...

); } const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const getStatusClass = (status) => { switch(status) { case 'confirmed': return 'confirmed'; case 'checked-in': return 'checked-in'; case 'checked-out': return 'checked-out'; case 'cancelled': return 'cancelled'; default: return 'pending'; } }; return (
{/* Image Carousel */}
{carouselImages.map((image, index) => (
))}
{/* Carousel Indicators */}
{carouselImages.map((_, index) => (
{/* Header Card */}

Luxury Guest Portal

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}! Experience excellence at every moment

{/* Reservations Table */}

Recent Reservations

{myReservations.length > 0 ? (
{myReservations.slice(0, 5).map(reservation => ( ))}
CONFIRMATION ROOM DETAILS CHECK-IN CHECK-OUT STATUS AMOUNT
{reservation.confirmationNumber}
Room {reservation.roomId?.roomNumber}
{reservation.roomId?.roomType}
 {new Date(reservation.checkInDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })} {new Date(reservation.checkOutDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })} {reservation.status} ${reservation.totalAmount?.toFixed(2)}
) : (

No reservations found

Start your luxury journey by booking a room

)}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose LuxuryStay

24/7 Concierge Service

Our dedicated concierge team is available round the clock to assist you with any request, ensuring your stay is seamless and memorable.

Premium Amenities

Enjoy world-class amenities including spa services, fine dining restaurants, fitness centers, and exclusive access to premium facilities.

Prime Locations

Strategically located in the heart of the city, providing easy access to major attractions, business districts, and entertainment venues.

Personalized Service

Every detail of your stay is tailored to your preferences, from room selection to dining recommendations and special arrangements.

Secure & Safe

Your safety and security are our top priorities with advanced security systems and 24/7 monitoring throughout the property.

Expert Staff

Our highly trained and professional staff members are committed to providing exceptional service and creating unforgettable experiences.

{/* Quick Actions */}

); }; export default GuestDashboard;
